SELECT rnum, ti_num, RESULT.s_num, s_name, ti_regdate, seat_date, COUNT(seat_num) AS seat_num, u_id, ti_status, img_name, img_dir, img_type, th_name, hall_turn, hall_time, s_price, pay_name, pay_amount, B.is_likes FROM ( SELECT rnum, t.ti_num, s.s_num, s_name, ti_regdate, seat_date, ts.seat_num, t.u_id, t.ti_status, img_name, img_dir, img_type, th.th_name, hall_turn, hall_time, s.s_price, p.pay_name, p.pay_amount FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rnum, ti_num, ti_regdate, seat_date, u_id, ti_status FROM ticket ) t JOIN ticket_seat ts ON t.ti_num = ts.ti_num JOIN seat se ON ts.seat_num = se.seat_num JOIN hall h ON se.hall_id = h.hall_id JOIN theater th ON h.th_num = th.th_num JOIN show s ON th.th_num = s.th_num JOIN img i ON s.s_num = i.s_num JOIN pay p ON t.ti_num = p.ti_num WHERE ts.ti_num = #{ti_num} AND t.u_id = #{u_id} AND img_dir LIKE '%'||'poster' ) RESULT LEFT JOIN (SELECT s_num, 1 is_likes FROM bookmark WHERE EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM bookmark WHERE u_id = #{u_id} AND s_num = #{s_num})) B ON RESULT.s_num = B.s_num GROUP BY rnum, ti_num, RESULT.s_num, s_name, ti_regdate, seat_date, u_id, ti_status, img_name, img_dir, img_type, th_name, hall_turn, hall_time, s_price, pay_name, pay_amount, B.is_likes
SELECT seat_num FROM ticket t JOIN ticket_seat ts ON t.ti_num = ts.ti_num WHERE t.ti_num = #{ti_num}
mapper.delete: DELETE bookmark WHERE u_id = #{u_id} AND s_num = #{s_num}
mapper.select: SELECT t.u_id, t.ti_num, s.s_name, seat_date FROM ticket t JOIN ticket_seat ts ON t.ti_num = ts.ti_num JOIN seat se ON ts.seat_num = se.seat_num JOIN hall h ON se.hall_id = h.hall_id JOIN theater th ON h.th_num = th.th_num JOIN show s ON th.th_num = s.th_num WHERE u_id = #{u_id} GROUP BY t.u_id, t.ti_num, s.s_name, seat_date

SELECT S.s_num, s_name, TO_CHAR(s_opendate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS s_opendate, TO_CHAR(s_closedate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS s_closedate, TO_CHAR(b_regidate,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS b_regidate FROM bookmark B INNER JOIN show S ON B.s_num = S.s_num WHERE u_id = #{u_id} ORDER BY b_regidate DESC

SELECT rnum, q_no, s_num, s_name, q_title, q_regdate FROM ( SELECT rnum, q_no, Q.s_num, s_name, q_title, TO_CHAR(q_regdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') q_regdate FROM ( SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(qna pk_qna) */ rownum AS rnum, q_no, s_num, q_title, q_regdate, u_id FROM qna ORDER BY q_no DESC ) Q INNER JOIN show S ON Q.s_num = S.s_num WHERE rownum <= (1 * 10) AND (u_id = #{u_id}) ) WHERE (rnum > (1 - 1) * 10)
